answers.answer: Oh hun..its not ur fault..ur doing a great job..sometimes these things happen ..and it has nothin 2 do with ur ability to keep ur baby safe.I kno its hard not 2.feel like that tho.. :/..im sure everything will be okay with proper medical care...just do ur best to take care of the situation from here on out..im sure both of u will be fine...good luck momma

You have to remember every pregnancy is different. Gestational diabetes has nothing to do with you not being healthy. It can be caused because of the changes in hormone levels. Do some research and follow your doctor's instructions and you should be fine. Hope you feel a little better :)

Thanks ladies!!! I have a diabetes app for tomorrow to set up what I need to do from this point out. I'm just having a hard time with it and freaking out I'm going to mess something up since I've never had to deal with anything like this..I've done a little research online and its helped a little :)

question: I'm freaking out and having a hard time accepting what I was just told!!! I got the results back from my 3hr Glucose Test and I have gestation diabetes :"( !!!!! I'm very upset about this as I have done everything I could to NOT have this..I don't intake a lot of sugary sweets or. drinks and eat relatively healthy so I just don't understand how this has happened!!!! This is my second baby and I didn't have this problem with my first :"(Can anyone with this or who has had this give me some peace of mind. I feel as tho I'm a failure in the one job I have in keeping my baby safe. Please please help me !!! :"(
title: Please HELP!!!!! FREAKING OUT!!!!
